entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Kitchener-Waterloo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:38 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Region of Waterloo Int'l Airport 01:54 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -0.6°C
Pressure: 100.4 kPa
Visibility: 3.6 km
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -1.6°C
Wind: N 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow or ice pellets. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of ice pellets mixed with freezing rain changing to light snow after midnight. Risk of a thunderstorm near midnight. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 11:52 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:52 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 overnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening. Forecast issued 11:52 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero. Forecast issued 11:52 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
